class.name: Camera25D
class.brief_description: 2.5-dimensional camera node, used to render 2.5D scenes.
class.description: Camera25D is a camera node for 2.5D scenes. It has a 2.5D transform like a [Node25D], and uses a [Camera2D] for rendering.

method.name: get_camera_2d
method.description: Returns the internal [Camera2D] used by this [Camera25D]. This is an internal node; freeing it may cause a crash.

method.name: make_current
method.description: Forces this [Camera25D] to become the current active one, overriding any other [Camera25D] or [Camera2D].

members.member: Controls whether the camera can be active or not. If [code]true[/code], the [Camera25D] will become the main camera when it enters the scene tree and there is no active [Camera25D] or [Camera2D] currently (see [method Viewport.get_camera_2d]). When the camera is currently active and [member is_enabled] is set to [code]false[/code], the next enabled [Camera25D] or [Camera2D] in the scene tree will become active. The active [Camera25D] shares the same state as [Camera2D] nodes. Only one [Camera25D] or [Camera2D] can be active at a time to render the 2D scene.

The camera's zoom. A zoom of [code]Vector(2, 2)[/code] doubles the size seen in the viewport. A zoom of [code]Vector(0.5, 0.5)[/code] halves the size seen in the viewport. This is a wrapper for [member Camera2D.zoom].
